        Builder

        Parameters:
        train - Training dataset
        dataBase - Data Base
        ruleBase - Rule set
        size - Population size
        BITS_GEN - Bits per gen
        maxTrials - Maximum number of evaluations
        alpha - Parameter alpha
        tipoAjuste - several types of tuning can be carried out, which are combinations between: lateral, amplitude and similarity
